    R

    removeColumn(String) - Method in class main.Table
    Removes a column from the table based on the specified column name.
    removeColumn(UUID, String) - Method in class main.TablrManager
     
    removeRow(int) - Method in class main.Column
    Removes a row from the column at the specified index.
    removeRow(int) - Method in class main.Table
    Removes a row from all columns in the table at the specified index.
    removeRow(UUID, int) - Method in class main.TablrManager
    Removes a row from the specified table and notifies listeners of the change.
    removeTable(UUID) - Method in class main.TablrManager
    Removes a table with the specified name from the list of tables managed by the TablrManager.
    renameColumn(String, String) - Method in class main.Table
    Renames an existing column in the table.
    RowsView - Class in main
    RowsView is a view for displaying and interacting with rows in a specific table managed by the TablrManager.
    RowsView(TablrManager, LayoutInfo, ViewList, UUID) - Constructor for class main.RowsView
    Constructs a RowsView instance for managing the view of rows in a specific table.
